mapper.insert: insert into chas_yw_xgjl (ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, DKSJ, KH, SBBH, QYID, QYMC, SBMC,ycqk ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{kh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ycqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update chas_yw_xgjl set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRSJ = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DKSJ = #{dksj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, KH = #{kh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SBBH = #{sbbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QYID = #{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QYMC = #{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SBMC= #{sbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ycqk=#{ycqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, DKSJ, KH, SBBH, QYID, QYMC, SBMC,ycqk from chas_yw_xgjl where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, DKSJ, KH, SBBH, QYID, QYMC, SBMC,ycqk from chas_yw_xgjl
1=1 and isdel = 0
and BAQID = '${baqid}'
and QYID = '${qyid}'
and KH = '${kh}'
and dksj >= '${kstime}'
and dksj <= '${jstime}'
and SBMC like '%${sbmc}%'
and BAQID in (select baqref.baqid from chas_xt_baqref baqref where baqref.sydwdm ='${sydwdm}')
